title: FontLab Studio 5 Metrics Assistance Problem
content:
Hi!

I created metrics class to copy the RSB (Right Side Bearing)and Width of the key glyph to other glyphs of the class. I expected that RSB and Width of all class members will be the same and LSB will differ according to outlines shape of every glyph. But actually, the Width is copied and both RSB and LSB are changed. So what’s the right way to get the result I expected?
